import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Container, Grid, Paper, Divider, Chip } from '@mui/material'; import { TrendingUp, Timeline, DonutLarge, AutoGraph, Psychology, Lightbulb, Storage, CleaningServices, BarChart, Insights } from '@mui/icons-material'; const Section = ({ title, children, icon }) => ( {icon} {title} {children} ); const CardItem = ({ title, description, tools }) => ( {title} {description} {tools && ( KEY TOOLS: {tools.map((tool, index) => ( ))} )} ); const Guide = () => { return ( {/* Header */} Business Analytics Masterclass From Data to Decisions: A Complete Blueprint {/* Level 1 */}
}> "Imagine a company asks: Why are sales dropping? Which product gives more profit? Which customers are likely to leave? What price should we set?" Business Analytics = ðŸ‘‰ Collect data ðŸ‘‰ Analyze it ðŸ‘‰ Find patterns ðŸ‘‰ Turn insights into decisions Itâ€™s storytelling with numbers. ðŸ“Š
{/* Level 2 */}
}>
{/* Level 3 */}
}> {[ { step: '1', title: 'Choose a Business Problem', content: 'Be specific. "Why are e-commerce sales dropping in South India?" Sharp topic = strong project.', icon: }, { step: '2', title: 'Collect Data', content: 'Sources: Kaggle, Google Datasets, or Mock Data. You need Sales, Customer, Product data.', icon: }, { step: '3', title: 'Clean the Data', content: 'Remove missing values, duplicates, wrong formats. Tools: Excel, Python (Pandas). Underrated but powerful.', icon: }, { step: '4', title: 'Analyze Data', content: 'Trend analysis, Compare regions, Profit margins. Use Graphs, Charts, Pivot tables. Make it visual.', icon: }, { step: '5', title: 'Create Insights', content: 'The real magic. Don\'t say "Sales decreased". Say "Sales decreased 12% due to 18% price rise".', icon: }, { step: '6', title: 'Give Recommendations', content: 'Introduce loyalty programs, Reduce price by 5%. Always end with solutions.', icon: } ].map((item, index) => ( {item.icon} STEP {item.step} {item.title} {item.content} ))}
{/* Level 4 */}
}> ðŸš€ Go Next Level Most students show charts and submit a report. You? We go next level. ðŸ’¡ Build a Dashboard Use interactive filters, region-wise sales, and profit margin toggles in Power BI or Tableau. ðŸ”® Predict Something Use regression to predict next 6 months sales. Show "Before vs After" simulations. ðŸŽ¬ Add Storytelling "Company X was losing customers. We discovered 60% churn came from high price sensitivity..." Make it feel like a documentary. ðŸš€ Future Scope Implement ML for better prediction, real-time dashboard, automate reporting. Professors love this.
{/* Final Vibe */} Final Vibe "Business Analytics is not about being a math genius. Itâ€™s about thinking like a CEO." ); }; export default Guide;
